body: Kitsune are defined by class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. Kitsune have the following racial traits.
name: Kitsune

sections.body: Kitsune are agile and companionable, but tend to be physically weak.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Charisma, –2 Strength

sections.body: Kitsune are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.
sections.name: Medium

sections.body: Kitsune have a base speed of 30 feet.
sections.name: Normal Speed

sections.body: Kitsune can see twice as far as humans in dim light.
sections.name: Low-Light Vision

sections.body: Kitsune receive a +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics checks.
sections.name: Agile

sections.body: In her natural form, a kitsune has a bite attack that deals 1d4 points of damage.
sections.name: Natural Weapons

sections.body: Kitsune begin play speaking Common and Sylvan. Kitsune with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: any human language, Aklo, Celestial, Elven, Gnome, and Tengu.
sections.name: Languages
